channel.title: Honda on Eddie Abbondanzio
channel.description: Recent content in Honda on Eddie Abbondanzio

item.title: B-Series Bolt Sizes
item.description: Trying to find the size of a missing bolt? I’m in the middle of swapping a B20B into my 1993 civic, and I had to buy (just about) every bolt / nut on the engine and transmission since I was missing so many. I also had the pleasure of tracking down all this information from various forums and sources. To try to help any others who are partaking in a similar project I’ve compiled a list of what I found below.
